title.rendered: HOUSE OF SKYE by Skye Yayoi Drynan at LAFW 2021

content.rendered:
24Fashion TV Exclusive: HOUSE OF SKYE by Skye Yayoi Drynan presented an inclusive, trendsetting collection.

When the theme of the show is Phoenix Rising, you know that the sky is the limit, and House of Skye did not disappoint! Skye's collection featured dramatic corsets, structured suits, and men's metallic jackets, as well as showcasing their globally patented Sexyback Bra. Among the models presenting this collection were stars of Bling Empire Kelly Li Mi and Kane Lim. The show was a grand spectacle in the best sense of the term and we can't wait to see more from Skye!

Watch the full show for FREE on 24FashionTV channel on ROKU TV or Amazon Fire TV

Photo by Liza Kushnir exclusively for 24Fashion TV

LAFW powered by Art Hearts Fashion
